text: Young people today make up the most progressive generation in history. Together we’ll sweep Trump out of office and take that movement to the White House. As president, I am prepared to take on pharmaceutical companies who are forcing Americans to turn to the black market for life-saving drugs.

We are better than this. 
https://twitter.com/nowthisnews/status/1170095076837666818 QT @nowthisnews This man switched to a cheaper insulin when the price of his life-saving medicine went up, a decision that was fatal. Now his fiancée is speaking out about the dangers of skyrocketing medical costs. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1170052380995592193/img/7kapAkRDliDXpsu9.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1170052380995592193/vid/320x320/4bOHtlhjEexn0zh0.mp4?tag=13

If @realDonaldTrump was serious about ending U.S. wars in the Middle East, he would’ve signed our bipartisan bill to stop the Yemen war instead of vetoing it.

If Congress does not stand up to him and defund it, the Saudi-led war could kill 233,000 Yemenis by the end of the year. https://twitter.com/independent/status/1123232668655788032 QT @Independent Yemen war dead could hit 233,000 by 2019 in what UN calls 'humanity's greatest preventable disaster' https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/middle-east/yemen-war-death-toll-un-houthi-gulf-saudi-arabia-arms-a8892926.html?utm_medium=Social&utm_source=Twitter#Echobox=1556634511

America first

The ongoing damage to the Amazon rainforest will have horrifying consequences for the world.

My colleagues and I are demanding the U.S. postpone all trade negotiations with Brazil until President Bolsonaro fully enforces his country’s environmental laws.

No one in America should die because they can't afford their medication. I can't believe we have to say that.

I have asked @theOFDA to deploy the @USNSComfort to #Freeport #GrandBahama. 

The Rand Memorial Hospital in #Freeport is damaged,its basement flooded & it’s being overwhelmed with demand while operating on limited capacity. 

Quick action is required.

Hoy el senador Rubio instó a @USAIDMarkGreen a que solicite que el @USNSComfort se reposicione en #Bahamas tras el #HuracánDorian.

El USNS Comfort con su tripulación médica, su cubierta de vuelo y su habilidad de desalinizar agua ayudaría a las Bahamas.
 https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=9DCE9B0F-B92C-4623-88E0-6DDCCE3A379F

We spend $80 billion a year locking up 2.2 million people.

Imagine what we could accomplish if we invested that in education instead of jails and incarceration.

As president I will aim to cut incarceration in this country in half.

The world's largest military budgets:
 
🇯🇵 $50 billion

🇸🇦 $83 billion

What if—just maybe—we led the world not in weapons and war, but in fighting humanity's common enemy: climate change?

Today Sen Marco Rubio urged @USAIDMarkGreen to request the @USNSComfort be repositioned to the #Bahamas after #HurricaneDorian.

USNS Comfort & its crew of trained medical staff, flight deck and ability to desalinate water, would help the Bahamian people

Medicare for All means:

- No premiums
- No co-pays
- No deductibles

Our challenges—from corporate corruption to campaign finance to criminal justice & more—are interrelated. We can’t focus on each in a vacuum.
